Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Located on a well trafficked Main Street
Pierce Town Hall and US Post Office are across Main Street driving traffic for a retail use.
800 SF shop creates flexibility and added value for users and tenants.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Pierce is located right on U.S. Highway 85 about 4 miles north of Ault. The town is a rural agricultural community located on the Colorado Eastern Plains north of Greeley.
Weld County is home to 304,633 people and had the second highest population growth rate of 3.5% in the State of Colorado.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
This property represents an opportunity to purchase a well-maintained building on a thriving main street and occupy half of it while benefiting from the financial assistance of a tenant occupying the other half. The current Tenant, EnerPLUS, is on a three-year lease term.
Located on Pierceâ€™s main street, this attractive building boasts large showroom windows with original wood floors, brick and stone walls and new restrooms equipped with showers. There is public street parking in front and up to 15 newly resurfaced private parking spaces in back.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Street Retail Property_Half Leased_Half Available for Owner/User or New Tenant

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Located on the southeast corner of E. Woodmen Rd. and Meridian Rd. in this rapidly growing residential community
Situated approximately 14 miles northeast of Colorado Springs
The center has ample parking and boasts strong household demographics
Shops at Woodmen Hills offers a savvy investor the opportunity to acquire a well-positioned, stable asset below new construction costs!
Offered at a Capitalization Rate of 6.35%.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located on the southeast corner of E. Woodmen Rd. and Meridian Rd.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE, Inc. proudly presents Shops at Woodmen Hills, positioned at the main intersection in Falcon. This 27,658 SF neighborhood center is 100% leased consisting of national and local tenants, all with long term in place leases..

CBRE, INC. as the exclusive representatives, are pleased to offer the investment sale of 1640 Riverside Avenue - Suite 200, a 3,880 SF retail space located in Fort Collins, CO. This two-story space offers attractive architecture and custom tenant finishes throughout. The Property is leased through July of 2025. While centrally located, the Property has convenient access to both I-25 and Old Town Fort Collins with excellent visibility and frontage on Riverside Avenue.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: This property is located in the heart of the Central Park Denver neighborhood in the King Soopers anchored EastBridge development. It is in close proximity to I-70 interchange to the north and the Fitzsimons Medical Campus to the east.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Operating dental office - please do not disturb. Virtual tour coming soon! The dental practice is expanding into a new location in Q2 2021.

Common.Brochures.Common.BrochureName: 362 S Lincoln Ave OM _LV Reduced Size.pdf

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Within walking distance to downtown Estes Park, and just a short drive away from Rocky Mountain National Park.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
555 S. Saint Vrain Avenue is a unique concrete commercial building in the lovely Colorado town of Estes Park. This prime location is just minutes to Rocky Mountain National Park and is walking distance to all the amenities downtown Estes Park has to offer.
Currently used as an eight lane bowling center with a restaurant/bar and a newly built patio. This building could easily be converted into a conference/ event center, brewery, nightclub, restaurant/bar, community hall, or an industrial application. The buildings current liquor license is transferable.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Unique Commercial Building For Sale In Estes Park
